content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestore123.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/rate_code.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
WITH(
    rate_code_id SMALLINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(30)
)
